data.actual_result: The embed is very stretched, and only the upper quarter/portion of the React and Message Options buttons are clickable
data.expected_result: Line break (char break) at some point in the rich embed, and the React and Message Options buttons are fully clickable
data.short_description: In rich embeds, very long links stretch the embed and block most of the message options button and the react button
data.steps_to_repro: - Send/view a message that has a rich embed in it with a very long link - Notice how stretched the embed is, and how you can only click on the upper quarter/portion of the React button and Message Options button
